---
name: User Story
about: Define a user story with acceptance criteria
title: '[STORY] '
labels: 'user-story, P2-medium'
assignees: ''
---

## User Story
**As a** [user persona]
**I want** [goal/desire]
**So that** [benefit/value]

**Example:** As a Senior Architect, I want to see which trigger fired multiple times in a transaction so that I can fix recursion issues.

## Background / Context
Why is this important? What's the user's pain point?

## Acceptance Criteria
**Given** [precondition]
**When** [action]
**Then** [expected outcome]

### Detailed Criteria
- [ ] Criterion 1
- [ ] Criterion 2
- [ ] Criterion 3

## User Scenarios
### Scenario 1: [Happy Path]
Description of typical usage

### Scenario 2: [Edge Case]
Description of edge case handling

## Dependencies
List any features or technical requirements that must exist first

## Out of Scope
What is explicitly NOT included in this story?

## Definition of Done
- [ ] Feature implemented per acceptance criteria
- [ ] Unit tests written and passing
- [ ] UI matches design (if applicable)
- [ ] Tested on Windows 10 and 11
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] No new compiler warnings

## Estimated Story Points
- [ ] 1 point (XS - 1-2 hours)
- [ ] 2 points (S - 2-4 hours)
- [ ] 3 points (M - 1-2 days)
- [ ] 5 points (L - 3-5 days)
- [ ] 8 points (XL - 1+ week)

## Priority
- [ ] P0 - Critical (MVP blocker)
- [ ] P1 - High (MVP feature)
- [ ] P2 - Medium (v1.1 or v1.2)
- [ ] P3 - Low (future consideration)
